name: Hidden Object: Blind Detective - Creepy Adventure
name_original: Hidden Object: Blind Detective - Creepy Adventure
description:
In London lives a mysterious detective. Detective Steve Totally blind people. Detective Steve very keen sense of smell like a dog. Steve has to find the murderer Jack the Ripper.

FEATURES:

- Beautiful Hidden Object Scenes
- You have to find each bar listed objects from screen in time
- Hint: silhouette helps you to find one of the objects.
- More 40 different levels and mini-games
